description: This file defines a mock class PersistentStoreImplementationMock for testing purposes. It inherits from multiple interfaces related to a persistent store, including IStore, IStore2, IStoreCache, IStoreInspector, and IStoreLimit. The class provides mocked methods for common storage operations such as setting, getting, deleting keys, managing namespaces, and cache operations. It is used to facilitate unit testing of components interacting with a persistent storage layer.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A mock class for the persistent store interfaces, used primarily for testing and simulating the behavior of the actual persistent store implementation.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of a notification callback for store events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a string value in a namespace.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a string value from a namespace.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a specific key within a namespace.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registering a notification callback for IStore2 interface.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistering the IStore2 notification callback.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a value with scope, namespace, key, value, and TTL in IStore2.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value and TTL for a given scope, namespace, and key.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a key in a specific scope within a namespace.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deleting a namespace within a specific scope.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieving keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieving all namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks getting the storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting the storage limit for a namespace.
